tokens.value: ‘Qay aṯi aḥuni, hawxa səmle, hawxa səmle, hawxa səmle... ŭ... ŭ maqṭelux aḥuni b̥ḥoli. Now then, Xalaf... Xalaf Baġ enters, he says, ‘Hey, sheikh’

Preterit.text: Hánəstene, Xalaf... Xalaf Baġ koʕobar komar, ‘Ya šēx’. Komar, ‘Mənyo?’ Komar, komar, ‘Qay aṯi aḥuni, hawxa səmle, hawxa səmle, hawxa səmle... ŭ... ŭ maqṭelux aḥuni b̥ḥoli. Now then, Xalaf... Xalaf Baġ enters, he says, ‘Hey, sheikh’. He says, ‘What is it?’ He says, he says, ‘Why did my brother come, he did like so, he did like so, he did like so... and... and you let my uncle kill my brother.
